Pienaar bụ aha nke nna Afrikaans a ma ama, nke sitere na French Pinard. Ndị Huguenot bi na  na mba Dutch East India Company wetara ya South Africa na afo 1688. Ndị nne na nna nke ezinụlọ Pienaar bụ Jacques Pinard, ọkwá nkà si Eure-et-Loir, na Esther Foucher (onye amụrụ Suèvres, Orléanais)

Mgbe Esther nwụsịrị, Pinard mechara lụọ Marthe le Fèbre, onye obodo Paarl. ZJ (Sakkie) Pienaar chịkọtara usoro ọmụmụ dị ukwuu nke ezinụlọ Pienaar na mba South Africa, ma bipụta ya na nzuzo dị ka "Die Pienaars in Suid-Afrika"
Christo Viljoen, onye nne ya bụ Pienaar, chịkọtara nsụgharị ọhụrụ nke usoro ọmụmụ Pienaar, dị ka "Pienaar Familieregister" ma bipụta ya site na Huguenot Society nke South Africa.
